article_title: Effect on Rockford workforce unclear as Blue Cross Blue Shield moves some claims work
article_text:
Rockford Register Star By Kevin Haas Rockford Register Star

Posted May 14, 2015 at 3:44 PM

Updated May 14, 2015 at 7:54 PM

article_metadata.description: ROCKFORD — Blue Cross Blue Shield of Illinois will outsource some of its claims processing work to Accenture over the next two years. It's unclear how the transition will affect workers across the state.Workers in Rockford were notified last week of the decision to transfer routine claims processing work to Accenture, fostering uncertainty among some. The company says it isn't clear how local workers will be affected but stressed that the decision will not lead to major layoffs. State
article_metadata.author: Kevin Haas Rockford Register Star
